00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *out;
00031     long len;
00032     struct List *list;
00033  
00034     adfEnvInitDefault();
00035 
00036 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00037 
00038     /* mount existing device : FFS */
00039     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00040     if (!hd) {
00041         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00042         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00046     if (!vol) {
00047         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00048         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00049         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00050     }
00051 
00052     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00053 
00054 
00055     /* write one file */
00056     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","w");
00057     if (!file) return 1;
00058     out = fopen( argv[2],"rb");
00059     if (!out) return 1;
00060     
00061     len = 600;
00062     n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00063     while(!feof(out)) {
00064         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00065         n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00066     }
00067     if (n>0)
00068         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00069 
00070     fclose(out);
00071 
00072     adfCloseFile(file);
00073 
00074     /* the directory */
00075     list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00076     while(list) {
00077         printEntry(list->content);
00078         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00079         list = list->next;
00080     }
00081     freeList(list);
00082 
00083 
00084     /* re read this file */
00085     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","r");
00086     if (!file) return 1;
00087     out = fopen("moon__gif","wb");
00088     if (!out) return 1;
00089 
00090     len = 300;
00091     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00092     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00093         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00094         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00095     }
00096     if (n>0)
00097         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00098 
00099     fclose(out);
00100 
00101     adfCloseFile(file);
00102 
00103     adfUnMount(vol);
00104     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00105 
00106 
00107     adfEnvCleanUp();
00108 
00109     return 0;
00110 }
